original: chos nyid la sogs du ma'i chos sku'i bdud rtsis nyon mongs nyes pa ma lus legs bkrus sum cu gnyis lhag mtshan gyis rab gsal 'jig rten bla ma ye shes lus can gnyis med thugs rje rtag tu rab dgyes dpe byad brgyad cu'i rgyan gyis mdzes gyur 'jig

analyzed: bsod nams ye shes jig rten srung mdzad dogs ba kun sel dga gsol dga

original: mgu rab stsol sgeg dang dpa' bo mi sdug drag shul snying rje la sogs sna tshogs ro yis 'jig rten rtag srung sprul sku gar mdzad he ru ka gtso rkang 'og mi yul bde 'gro gzugs gcig gzugs bzang gzugs ngan ma lus gzugs spangs te nyid gsum ldan

original: rdo rje gsum bdag sems gsum dbyer med rnal 'byor bzhi dag byang chub bzhi rtogs sku bzhi rab grub tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mig lnga dang ldan ye shes lnga bdag dag pa'i dbang po rdo rje ba spu steng gi tshangs bug gtsug tor 'khor lo'i nang khyab bcu
analyzed: rdo rje gsum bdag sems gsum dbyer med rnal byor bzhi dag byang chub bzhi rtogs sku bzhi rab grub tshangs ba gnas bzhi mig lnga dang ldan ye shes lnga bdag dag ba dbang po rdo rje ba spu steng gi tshangs bug gtsug tor khor lo nang khyab chu

original: drug dga' bas rab gang ye shes chen po'i khams kyis cher rdzogs bcu drug cha yis shes rab snang ba gtsug tor chen po'i 'khor lo dag tu 'gyur ba med gnas de nyid sa dang reg byed las skyes rlung dang nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin mgo bo

original: mgrin pa snying ga dang ni gsang ba la gnas zla ba nyi ma dus kyi me dang mun pha la zhugs dri med skyas mchog legs smin dngul chu zhes bya'i mtshan mthar ye shes dam pa bla med tshul khrims dam pa'i chos grub khyab bdag 'jig rten ma

original: lus mthar byed log par lta 'joms 'jig rten mun sel dus kyi 'khor lo tshangs chen khyab 'jug rdo rje can bde 'gyur rnams kyis mchod bstod bsten cing spyi bos rab gtugs 'byung po dri za gnod sbyin lto 'phye zhing skyong la sogs pa dang 'jig rten skyong

analyzed: de ltar bdag gis rgyun chags bstod ba bgyid ba las

analyzed: bsod nams gang des dus mthar gro ba skye ba yi
